metadata.title: CVE-2020-25201 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
HashiCorp Consul Enterprise version 1.7.0 up to 1.8.4 includes a namespacereplication bug which can be triggered to cause denial of service viainfinite Raft writes. Fixed in 1.7.9 and 1.8.5.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
